raw_comment:
1) Mali is on the lowest end of the spectrum, and Indonesia at the highest.
2) First, on what information, specifically, is this graph based on, and two, why is Indonesia at the top?

ace_sentences: Mali is at the lowest end of the spectrum.
Indonesia is at the highest end of the spectrum.
I ask on what information this graph is based.
I ask why Indonesia is at the top.
